mapper.select: SELECT T.TYPE_NAME, SUM(I.QUANTITY * P.PRICE) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM HOS_ORDER_ITEM I, PRODUCT_TYPE T, SUP_PRODUCT P WHERE I.PRODUCT_NUM = P.PRODUCT_NUM AND T.TYPE_NUM = P.TYPE_NUM AND MONTH(I.ORDER_DATE) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR(I.ORDER_DATE) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) GROUP BY T.TYPE_NAME;
